snippet: The recovery of President Nelson Mandela, the former president of South Africa, is “on track” at his home, the government said Wednesday.
abstract: South African government says that recovery of former president Nelson Mandela is on track at his home; Mandela had been released from hospital days before after being treated for lung infection and gallstone operation.
lead_paragraph: The recovery of President Nelson Mandela, the former president of South Africa, is “on track” at his home, the government said Wednesday.

headline.seo: South Africa: Government Says Mandela Is Recovering
headline.main: South Africa: Government Says Mandela Is Recovering
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Government Says Mandela Is Recovering
